description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTPneumococcal3Doses for IMMZ.D2.DT.Pneumococcal.3 doses. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a pneumococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 3 primary doses (3p+0)
